Uses of Package
com.att.ads

Packages that use com.att.ads
com.att.ads This package contains authorization service, ads service, Data Manager and logging. 
com.att.ads.controllers This package contains Network controller. 
com.att.ads.listeners This package contains a Listener to handle the call backs from the ATTAdView. 
com.att.ads.model This package contains ad service request and response. 
 

Classes in com.att.ads used by com.att.ads
AdLog
          Customized Logger to enable and disable the logger as user required.
ATTAdView
          Use the ATTAdView class to embed advertisement content in your application.
ATTAdView.RefreshTask
           
ATTAdViewError
          Class encapsulates the error type, message and exception information.
DataManager
          DataManager is a Singleton class and manages the data loading requests.
DataManager.DataParameters
          Inner class to encapsulates the core required data for processing.
DataManager.DataThread
          Runnable class to initiate the data loading process asynchronously.
 

Classes in com.att.ads used by com.att.ads.controllers
ATTAdView
          Use the ATTAdView class to embed advertisement content in your application.
 

Classes in com.att.ads used by com.att.ads.listeners
ATTAdViewError
          Class encapsulates the error type, message and exception information.
 

Classes in com.att.ads used by com.att.ads.model
AdLog
          Customized Logger to enable and disable the logger as user required.
